title: Is anyone experiencing an increase on the amount of troll picks in ranked?
body: Just seems like over the past week the quality of play has dramatically decreased. Just wondering if anyone else has noticed or maybe I am just unlucky.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=King Lmn Pancake,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=W5W0LB6r,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-08T06:46:08.069+0000)
>
> Just seems like over the past week the quality of play has dramatically decreased. Just wondering if anyone else has noticed or maybe I am just unlucky.

Yeah, I've noticed it also. I guess it depends at what position of the spectrum you are in, but in low elo there are so many newbies that have just bought botted accounts to level 30, and have no idea what they are doing in ranked.

A lot of people are choosing to do off-meta bot lane picks now, made famous by some streamers. Quite often you will be seeing a ziggs ap carry bot + whatever support. It isn't necessarily "troll", but rather an attempt at redefining the player determined meta because at the moment ADC is not in a good position (so much so that [Rioters are receiving death threats](http://www.idigitaltimes.com/league-legends-developer-ghostcrawler-receives-death-threats-and-more-over-blog-posts-577223) over it). 

If you want to avoid this kind of thing, I suggest you play flex with a full premade so you can choose who you play (to avoid trolls/laggers/inters) with and have that extra layer of communication to make your games a little more enjoyable. 

If these players are full on trolling (and by this I mean actually trolling, not just playing off meta or being bad at the game) then feel free to report them through the end of game screen. If it isn't verbal toxicity that you are reporting for, be sure to include a little comment on _why_ you are reporting them (maybe they are intentionally throwing games at the last second).

If it isn't verbal toxicity that you are reporting for, be sure to include a little comment on _why_ you are reporting them (maybe they are intentionally throwing games at the last second).

I don't mind Ziggs but is Urgot and Shaco support really warranted for high diamond?
It would depend on what your definition of "troll pick" is, a lot of times it's just people playing their choice of champs who are for one reason or another considered troll-picks by others.
